image.altText: A man wearing a suit and glasses looks ahead

props.synopsis: The head of GFG Alliance Sanjeev Gupta says there will be no more job losses at the Whyalla steelworks, while not being able to give a firm timeline on when he expects the blast furnace to come online again.Â

image.altText: Composite image showing Charlie Stevens and Dhirren Randhawa.

props.synopsis: The teenager who struck and killed South Australian Police Commissioner Grant Steven's son at Schoolies celebrations last year has been handed a suspended sentence.

image.altText: A young brunette girl with glasses on holds a yellow flower

image.altText: Girl with blurred face dancing in a red tutu with elaborate gold embroidery
